name: YRUMT
description:
Audio-only rhythm/memory game for the #VGLgamejam.

How to play: Press the letters on your keyboard when you hear them!

Play in browser: https://dav.li/YRUMT/

CREDITS:

  • Text-to-speech: http://mary.dfki.de/
  • Music viz sample code: https://therewasaguy.github.io/p5-music-viz/
  • Font 1: https://www.fontspace.com/blockstepped-font-f4016
  • Font2: https://www.fontspace.com/gamepixies-font-f42493
  • TV effect gif: https://gifer.com/en/LM4p
